effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 494,741 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 248,744.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

(2) Set: Reversion's healing is increased by 10%, and it has a 50% chance to grant 1 additional stack of Temporal Compression.
(4) Set: Temporal Compression increases the healing of your next empower spell by 5% per stack.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
